title: Big Play Slay joins J&J!
description:
Darius "Big Play" Slay, 4x Pro Bowler, All Pro, and cornerback for the Philadelphia Eagles drops in to J&J to talk everything from how to defend Kyler Murray, the best corners in the league, and the Philly-Dallas rivalry... to his pre-game slow jams. Plus! The guys go deep on NBA Super Prospect Unicorn and all around Giant Guy Victor Wembanyama - the hype is real! Plus Zion is back, and LeBron airs beef with Kareem. Tap in! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
